title: Who was the second party to reach the South Pole? - Quora

response.answer_text: The British Team led by Robert Scott were the 2nd party to arrive at the south pole. They found the camp of Roald Amundsen there so knew immediately that they had lost the race to the south pole. Amundsen reached the pole on the 14th of December 1911 and there was enough time to get back home before the terrible Antarctic winter set in. But Scott and his team arrived too late on January 17th 1912, and all tragically died as temperatures plummeted and blizzards set in.
In 1911, Britain's Robert Falcon Scott and Norway's Roald Amundsen both launched expeditions to reach the Pole.
The British party led by Robert Falcon Scott. The first to get there was the Norwegian party led Roald Amundsen which was 5 weeks ahead of Scott’s party.
